description: The scene depicts individuals trapped in a powerless, dark elevator. The suggested action of introducing oneself in this tense, sightless environment highlights the absurdity of social convention amidst potential crisis. The darkness conceals the appearances of the occupants, adding a layer of suspense and humor to the idea of formal introductions. The juxtaposition of the unsettling situation and the mundane suggestion creates a sense of dark humor and surrealism.
caption: Well ... since the elevator's power is dead, why don't we all just introduce ourselves?
